ygData.subject: Re: A few general ramblings on attaining some SAFE coin...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have done this, and can attest that it works.  Admittedly, that was not the aim.  I was merely waiting for a GM to help me with a corpse lost due to a
ygData.messageBody:
JR McConnell wrote:
> Like
> after losing all ones possessions and having to start over. for one can
> stomp a few rats to buy bait, then it is off to the water side so you can
> get coin for a weapon (or be luckily enough to fish one out of the sea.

I have done this, and can attest that it works. Admittedly, that
was not the aim. I was merely waiting for a GM to help me with a
corpse lost due to a crash. (If you're wondering, I maxed out my
fishing skill, and I was level 9 at the time).

The gold from the fish gave me enough to buy a sewing kit, and I
ventured out to get some ruined cat pelts to replace my armour. A
weapon was easily looted from a skeleton in the newbie area.

Mully
Veeshan
